alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Chattahoochee; Crawford; Houston; Macon; Marion; Muscogee; Peach; Schley; Taylor; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 7:08PM EDT until August 03 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Macon County in west central Georgia... Marion County in west central Georgia... Southern Bibb County in central Georgia... Southern Twiggs County in central Georgia... Southern Muscogee County in west central Georgia... Chattahoochee County in west central Georgia... Peach County in central Georgia... Houston County in central Georgia... Southeastern Crawford County in central Georgia... Central Schley County in west central Georgia... Taylor County in west central Georgia... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 708 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Payne to near Horns to near Green Island Hills, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Macon, Perry, Fort Valley, Buena Vista, Butler, Oglethorpe, Cusseta, Warner Robins, Centerville, Byron, Montezuma, Marshallville, Reynolds, Ideal, Fort Moore, Robins AFB, North Fort Moore, Putnam, Brantley, and Hayneville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Bibb; Chattahoochee; Crawford; Houston; Macon; Marion; Muscogee; Peach; Schley; Taylor; Twiggs
